description: Whales leap and bound at play all around the ship. The beautiful sight cheers the crew and is taken as a sign of good luck.
A sudden storm batters the ship, causing some damage.
Your crew discovers a small cache of valuable goods hidden in a secret compartment.
You spot a beautiful rainbow on the horizon. The crew takes it as a good omen.

You pass the wreckage of a vessel that looks to have been looted and burned. It was a large Galleon with a lot of guns. Sharks abound in the water. The crew takes it as an ominous sign for the voyage.
A pod of friendly dolphins guides your ship through a treacherous reef, saving you from potential disaster.
Your ship encounters a thick fog bank, slowing your progress and putting the crew on edge.
A charismatic storyteller among the crew boosts morale with tales of legendary pirates and hidden treasures.
Your ship's cook discovers a way to make hardtack more palatable, improving the crew's spirits.
A minor mutiny breaks out but is quickly quelled. The ringleaders are punished, but tension remains high.
Your navigator spots a previously uncharted island. Mapping it could prove valuable.
A freak wave washes over the deck, sweeping away some supplies and a few unlucky crew members.
Your ship rescues survivors from a shipwreck. They're grateful and offer to join your crew.
A sea serpent is spotted in the distance. The crew is both terrified and excited by the rare sight.
Your ship discovers a hidden cove full of valuable pearls. The crew is ecstatic about the find.
A powerful tailwind fills your sails, dramatically increasing your speed for a day.
Your ship's carpenter invents a new technique for patching hull damage, improving your ship's durability.
A stowaway is discovered on board. They turn out to be a skilled navigator fleeing from a rival pirate crew.
Your crew successfully fends off an attack by giant squids, boosting their confidence in combat.
A crewmember falls ill with a mysterious tropical disease, causing worry among the rest of the crew.
Your ship passes through waters said to be haunted. Strange noises and eerie lights unsettle the crew.
A foreign merchant vessel offers to trade rare spices for some of your cargo.
Your ship's gunner devises a more efficient way to load the cannons, improving your combat readiness.
A series of small leaks are discovered in the hull. They're patched, but the ship needs proper repairs soon.
Your crew catches an enormous tuna, providing a feast and lifting spirits.
